segments.text: That overflowing sink is disgusting—water everywhere, soaking everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle's spreading like some gross spill.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Woman's foot is in it, and she doesn't care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her drying the plate seems pointless with this mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Cabinets are getting ruined by the water streaming down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now the kids climbing for cookies—filthy hands in the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Stool's unstable, but they're ignoring the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy's plate is probably dropping crumbs everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl's just standing there, begging for a treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole kitchen's turning into a sloppy disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside garden looks clean and nice in contrast.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand seeing this kind of neglect.
segments.speaker: PAR
